sections.heading: districts and educational service units; Nebraska Budget Act applicable
sections.text: The annual budget of all school districts and educational service units shall be subject to the Nebraska Budget Act.SourceLaws 1967, c. 509, ยง 1, p. 1711;Laws 1971, LB 292, ยง 19;R.S.1943, (1981), ยง 79-548;Laws 1987, LB 127, ยง 2;
